long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The TapTrust Wallet Browser Extension makes it easy to use any supported web3 app or send custom transactions from your browser.

TapTrust Wallet for iOS and Android makes it much easier to get started with decentralized apps:

* Secure login with a username and password -  no keys or seed phrases needed. 
* Get started in seconds with a built-in voucher feature that lets you acquire free tokens and items
* Automated volatility and security protection
